AboutMe: Researcher in historical linguistics, formal syntax & semantics, and other areas of language/linguistics. I enjoy (La)TeX, beautiful free/open fonts, Emacs, black & green teas, Nepali cuisine, classic blues, reggae, traditional folk music, Anglo-Saxon poetry, Linux, Vedic rituals, Rockbox, khukuris, cricket, aperiodic tilings, and steam-powered analytical engines.
